title: Vinturi Spirit Aerator featuring Tenley Molzhan
description: From Cognac, Scotch, Port and Whiskey to Bourbon, Vodka, Gin Rum and Brandy, the Vinturi Spirit Aerator releases the full potential of any undiluted spirit allowing it to be apprecaited like never before.  With a convenient built-in jigger to measure out servings and a sleek, compact design, the Vinturi Spirit is an essential tool for modern at-home bartenders looking to expand their repertoire and maximize their skills,

asset.author: VinturiStaff
asset.description: From Cognac, Scotch, Port and Whiskey to Bourbon, Vodka, Gin Rum and Brandy, the Vinturi Spirit Aerator releases the full potential of any undiluted spirit allowing it to be apprecaited like never before.  With a convenient built-in jigger to measure out servings and a sleek, compact design, the Vinturi Spirit is an essential tool for modern at-home bartenders looking to expand their repertoire and maximize their skills,

transcripts: Everyone who enjoys both red and white wine understand the benefits of aeration however a lesser-known fact is that the majority of spirits benefit significantly from contact with oxygen too. The Vinturi spirit aerator has been specifically designed for spirits using the same technology that is applied to wine. This Vinturi spirit aerator infuses the air as you release the spirit's moving out and enhancing the taste while also developing a full aroma. You can use this product with all spirits from cognac to tequila before and after test of the Spirit aerator never fails to amaze. You can see the Vinturi spirit has a servings measure on the side, this is useful for both straight and mixed drinks. Here's how it works I'm going to hold the aerator above my glass and pour in the spirit, once measured you push this button to release it for aeration i'll make sure not to block any of the air tubes after all our unique Aaron fusion technique is what allows the spirit to aerate quickly and properly. Hear that, that specific sound is exclusive to Vinturi aerators and means your liquor is being fully aerated to maximize your enjoyment. This essential spirit narrator by Vinturi choice their growing family of aeration devices and should enhance any modern at home bartenders repertoire while maximizing skills and guests appreciation, you just have to try it to believe it. Cheers.
